+ Details
Name: ecd_PvpTable
Namespace Prefix: ecd_
Data Type: xbrli:stringItemType
Balance Type: na
Period Type: duration
X
- Definition

The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.
